T11pramanvu:2838: nivarttakaḥ sa evātaḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.245 //
T11pramanvu:2844: tairvinā bhavato 'nyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.248 //
T11pramanvu:2846: sā cenna bhedikā prāptamekarūpamidaṃ jagat // Pramāṇav_4.249 //
T11pramanvu:2848: ekasya nānārūpatve dve rūpe pāvaketarau // Pramāṇav_4.250 //
T11pramanvu:2849: tat tasyā jananaṃ rūpamanyasya yadi saiva sā /
T11pramanvu:2850: na tasyā jananaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyāḥ sambhavet katham // Pramāṇav_4.251 //
T11pramanvu:2852: tasmāt svadṛṣṭāviva tad dṛṣṭe kārye 'pi gamyate // Pramāṇav_4.252 //
T11pramanvu:2854: dravaśakteḥ yataḥ kledaḥ sā tvekaiva dvayorapi // Pramāṇav_4.253 //
T11pramanvu:2858: yenāṃśenādadhad dhūmaṃ tenāṃśena tathā gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.255 //
T11pramanvu:2862: anagnicedadhūmo 'sau sa dhūmaścet sa pāvakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.257 //
T11pramanvu:2870: vastunyapi tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.262 //
T11pramanvu:2880: kevalaṃ siddhasādharmyāt smāryate samayaṃ paraḥ // Pramāṇav_4.267 //
T11pramanvu:2890: anyathā hyanavasthāto bhedaḥ sighyenna kasyacit // Pramāṇav_4.272 //
T11pramanvu:2901: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate /
T11pramanvu:2908: tameva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.281 //
T11pramanvu:2909: ātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddhatmanaḥ sataḥ /
T11pramanvu:2910: nātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate // Pramāṇav_4.282 //
T11pramanvu:2912: yathā na kṣepabhāgiṣṭaḥ sa evodbhūtanāśakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.283 //
T11pramanvu:2914: bhāvo hi sa tathā bhūto 'bhāva bhāvastathā katham // Pramāṇav_4.284 //
